definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: I've ordered savory pork and cole slaw.
sentences.chinese: 我点了咸猪肉和凉拌生菜丝。

sentences.english: There are hundreds of kinds of head and leaf lettuces.
sentences.chinese: 社会上有头叶生菜上百种。

sentences.english: The inhibitory effect increased with the enhanced contents of the vegetable homogenate.
sentences.chinese: 生菜浆较熟菜浆的抑制作用更强。

sentences.english: Remove the lettuce from its store packaging. Then, wrap it in paper toweling, and place it in an open storage bag.
sentences.chinese: 往掉生菜包装，用厨房纸包好，放进打开的包装袋中。

sentences.english: All above come with lettuce, tomato, onion and cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 以上均配有生菜，西红柿，洋葱和青瓜。

sentences.english: On market day, I go to the market with my lettuces.
sentences.chinese: 有市集的那天，我拿我的生菜去那里卖。

sentences.english: On the first night, we had some salad and instant noodle.
sentences.chinese: 第一晚的晚餐，我们吃了生菜沙拉跟泡面。

sentences.english: We had a simple dinner of buckwheat bread and boiled lettuce.
sentences.chinese: 我们的晚饭很简单，就是荞馍馍和水煮的生菜。

sentences.english: Feta cheese, marinated grilled mixed bell peppers, sliced olives and lettuce sesoned with oregano.
sentences.chinese: 发达芝士，腌烤青椒，切片橄榄，生菜，香料。

sentences.english: Rinse lettuce, then shred it. Place on a plate, put chicken on top.
sentences.chinese: 生菜洗净，切成丝，放在碟中，上面放上鸡块。

sentences.english: Asparagus, Orange, Roasted pumpkin, Lettuce, Honey vinaigrette.
sentences.chinese: 芦笋，橙，烤南瓜，生菜，蜂蜜香醋。

sentences.english: Pull the leaves from the outside of the planting so the inside leaves will keep growing.
sentences.chinese: 把生菜外面的叶子摘下来，这样里面叶子能继续生长。

sentences.english: Local lettuce, Shitake mushroom, Bean sprouts.
Turkey, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise on white bread.
sentences.chinese: 火鸡，生菜，西红柿，美乃汁，白吐司。

sentences.english: Fresh lettuce and other salad greens, for example, are badly contaminated by yeasts and molds.
sentences.chinese: 比如，新鲜的生菜和沙拉，严重污染酵母菌和霉菌。

sentences.english: He had a steak and a green salad.
sentences.chinese: 他要了一块牛排和一份生菜沙拉。

definition: variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
variant of 西蘭花|西兰花[xi1 lan2 hua1]
enoki mushroom (Flammulina velutipes, Japanese えのき茸 enokitake), used in cuisines of Japan, Korea and China, cultivated to be long, thin and white/abbr. to 金菇
